Subject: FW: Damage incident camera  video

 

Dear All,

 

I would like to report an incident that occurred yesterday evening 21st Sep 2025 at  Rosenthal Galleries La Fayette store. 

*	Location:
	Daum section
*	Product Involved:
	05624 Daum Falcon Gerfaut 125EX

I would like to report an incident that occurred yesterday evening 21st Sep 2025 at  Rosenthal Galleries La Fayette store. 

*	Location:
	Daum section
*	Product Involved:
	05624 Daum Falcon Gerfaut 125EX

 

While our team member Hisham was at the rest room, customer was browsing our products on the sales floor. The client attempted to carry the above-mentioned item. Luckily, no injuries were reported; however, the item slipped from his hand and fell, resulting in damage to the tail side, as shown in the attached footage.

 

The accident has been reported through Focus under INC#163048.

Please let me know if you require any further information.

 

Regards,

 

ANAS KHOURSAN

​​​​

SENIOR STORE MANAGER

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
